body:
Per discussion with @psakievich
- Add `+exodus~fortran` conflict  (before #25549 building `+exodus~fortran` would secretly enable Fortran)
- Enable vendored trilinos gtest package when `self.run_tests` for trilinos developers

I also:
- reordered some of the conflicts/deps in a separate commit to make them easier to find.
- removed the `zlib` variant in favor of always enabling GZIP compression in Zoltan when that package is enabled (there's such a thing as too-fine granularity in package options...)
title: trilinos: add conflict and enable gtest for developers
